Name: TOGETHER VR
About the game: Just download DLC for free and play without a VR device! I wanna throw darts with you. I wanna play games with you. I wanna act vulnerable with you all the time however late it is. I wanna be with you forever... TOGETHER VR is a virtual reality experience that allows players to experience everyday life with Hoshihara Mei in their own private den. The game offers players the opportunity to play different games with Mei and enjoy couple-like interaction. Players can also transform into digital warriors and engage in an exciting space battles. Features: ▪ Exquisite pictures and atmosphere, with full of realistic experience. ▪ Use the motion controllers to communicate and interact with her in a variety of ways. ▪ Fully experience immersive virtual reality with crouching or even lying prone. ▪ Dazzling special effects and life-or-death situations for you to challenge.
